alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 7:16PM EDT until July 27 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Houghton County in western Upper Michigan... Southern Ontonagon County in western Upper Michigan... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 715 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bruce Crossing, or 22 miles south of Ontonagon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bruce Crossing around 725 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Kenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
